===
=== replication package for the tutorial:
=== ASMETA tool set for rigorous system design
===

available at: 

https://foselab.unibg.it/asmeta/asmeta_tutorialFM24.zip

Execute run_eclipsewnusmv.bat (under windows) to open eclipse with all the asmeta tools, with the workspace containing the models

workspace --> the workspace with the libraries and the models
eclipse --> eclipse + the plugins
NuSMV-2.6.0-win64 --> model checker
nuXmv-2.0.0-win64 --> model checker
